hero.title: Share Expenses with Groups
hero.subtitle: Manage shared expenses easily with friends, family, roommates, and more

shared_expenses.title: Shared Expenses
shared_expenses.description: Track expenses that multiple people contribute to, perfect for shared living situations or group activities

split_bills.title: Automatic Bill Splitting
split_bills.description: Automatically calculate how much each member owes based on their share of group expenses

track_spending.title: Real-Time Tracking
track_spending.description: See group spending in real-time. Everyone stays updated on shared expenses instantly

notifications.title: Smart Notifications
notifications.description: Get notified when new expenses are added or when payments are needed

secure.title: Secure & Private
secure.description: Your financial data is encrypted and only shared with group members you invite

insights.title: Group Insights
insights.description: Visualize group spending patterns with charts and analytics to make better decisions

step1.title: Create a Group
step1.description: Give your group a name and optionally add a description. Examples: 'Family Budget', 'Vacation 2025', 'Apartment Rent'

step2.title: Invite Members
step2.description: Add group members by email. They'll receive an invitation to join and can accept or decline

step3.title: Add Shared Expenses
step3.description: Any member can add expenses to the group. Tag transactions as group expenses when adding them

step4.title: Track & Settle Up
step4.description: See who owes what in real-time. Use the balance summary to settle up fairly among all members

family.title: Family Budgets
family.description: Manage household expenses together. Track groceries, utilities, and shared family costs in one place

roommates.title: Roommate Expenses
roommates.description: Split rent, utilities, and shared supplies fairly. No more awkward conversations about who owes what

trips.title: Group Trips
trips.description: Planning a vacation? Track all travel expenses and split costs evenly or by custom amounts

projects.title: Team Projects
projects.description: Manage project budgets with your team. Track expenses and keep everyone accountable

benefits.title: Benefits of Using Groups
benefits.benefit1: No more manual calculations or spreadsheets
benefits.benefit2: Everyone sees the same information in real-time
benefits.benefit4: Historical records of all group transactions
benefits.benefit5: Easy to add new members or remove old ones

cta.title: Ready to Get Started?
cta.description: Create your first group today and start managing shared expenses the smart way

whatsNew.title: What's New
whatsNew.subtitle: The latest releases from your financial app Monity
whatsNew.empty_title: We don't have any updates for you yet
whatsNew.empty_description: When there's news, we'll post it here. Follow your favorite features and updates to stay updated on them too.

analyticsConsent.title: We value your privacy
analyticsConsent.description: We use analytics to improve your experience with Monity. This helps us understand how you use the app and make it better. We respect your privacy - your data stays with us and is never sold to third parties. You can change your preferences anytime in settings.
analyticsConsent.learnMore: Learn more about our privacy policy

morning.joyful: Good morning, {{name}}! It's a great day!

night.playful: Don't let the bed bugs bite, {{name}}!
